name: places/ChIJ_1WKbpJZwokRyG4Nbvv5A1I
formattedAddress: 70 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 70 Greenwich Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Stylish boutique featuring a playful, eclectic collection of vintage & custom designer eyewear.

originalText.text: My wife and I have been coming to Surreal Eyewear for years.  They have an incredible selection of stylish frames and some of the best customer service that you will find in New York.  I most recently had the pleasure of working with Anthony, who I cannot recommend highly enough.

text.text: My wife and I have been coming to Surreal Eyewear for years.  They have an incredible selection of stylish frames and some of the best customer service that you will find in New York.  I most recently had the pleasure of working with Anthony, who I cannot recommend highly enough.

originalText.text: I am from out of town and my glasses broke. Anthony was kind to repair them. He was very nice and the store has beautiful glasses. Highly recommend.

text.text: I am from out of town and my glasses broke. Anthony was kind to repair them. He was very nice and the store has beautiful glasses. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: I’ve been searching for a place to find FUN, FUNKY, and most importantly WIDE frames. Anthony - helped me out big time and make the frame selection process fun and incredibly personable. I really appreciated his candor and will definitely be coming back for prescription and sunglasses.

text.text: I’ve been searching for a place to find FUN, FUNKY, and most importantly WIDE frames. Anthony - helped me out big time and make the frame selection process fun and incredibly personable. I really appreciated his candor and will definitely be coming back for prescription and sunglasses.

originalText.text:
This is the best damn optical store I have EVER shopped at.  The store is small and tastefully appointed.  The limited glasses in view are handsomely displayed and represent maybe 10% of the available frames.  This way you are not bombarded with rows and rows of frames in a glass case or on a wall the way every other optical store displays their goods.

The total selection is artfully curated with unique international designers and manufacturers, so if you are looking for names like Calvin Klein, Prada and Gucci stop looking here and go to Cohens Fashion Optical or any other neighborhood big box optical store.  The product line is updated regularly so you can always find something new and interesting as well as an old favorite.

The prices are on the premium side but worth it.  The frames are unique and beautiful.  It is unlikely that you will run across your frame on someone else.

The staff are superior professionals who know their craft and understand eyewear and it's relation to the face.  They will guide you toward frames that suit you best and even toward something you may not have initially chosen.  They aren't just trying to sell you.

There is no doctor on sight but they can refer you to one close by.  They are also quite fanatical about the accuracy of the fit and how the prescription is filled.  They really stand behind their product.

I have purchased probably 6 or more frames from Surreal over the past few years and this is my Go To spot for my eyewear.  I actually carry their business cards with me to hand out because I get many complements and inquiries on where I purchased my glasses from.  Stop by Surreal, you  will not be disappointed.

originalText.text:
Surreal, Surreal, Surreal……Their specs are certainly SURREAL.  If you’re looking for the typical name brands don’t go. If you like boutique stores that offer special,  and one of a kind frames this is the place to go.  Words cannot do justice to what I call the Oleg experience.  Make an appointment and see for yourself.

P. S. Don’t be embarrassed when you go in for one pair and walk out with three. As I have often done. The problem is to many great choices.
